pageProps.children:
{"type":"Layout","key":null,"props":{"title":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Daily Note"}},"children":[{"type":"Seo","key":null,"props":{}},{"type":"div","key":null,"props":{"className":"flex flex-col items-center","children":[{"type":"div","key":null,"props":{"className":"textbox","children":[{"type":"h3","key":null,"props":{"children":"American Idioms for Business"}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"shout-out"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""Shout-out" 是一种用来公开感谢或表扬某人的方式，通常是在大众面前通过口头或书面的形式表达赞赏或认可。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：I want to give a shout-out to my team for their hard work and dedication on this project."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"my right-hand man"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"在中文中，这个短语可以解释为“我的得力助手”或“我最信任的人”。它指的是一个在工作或生活中给予重要支持和帮助的人，通常是非常可靠和值得信赖的。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：In the office, Mark is my right-hand man; I can always count on him to help with any project."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"going the extra mile"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“超越期望”或“额外付出”为顾客或任务付出额外的努力，以达到更高的标准。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"She always goes the extra mile to ensure her clients are satisfied with her service.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"think outside the box"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“跳出框框思考”指的是从惯常的思维模式中解放出来，用创新和非传统的方法解决问题或处理事情。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"In order to solve the complex problem, the team had to think outside the box and develop a novel approach.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"buy in"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""买入"是指购买某种商品、股票或其他资产，通常是因为预期其价值会上升或者为了在市场中持有一个位置。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"He decided to buy in shares of the company after hearing about its new product launch.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"on boarding"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""On boarding" 指的是新员工入职培训或新员工融入某个组织的过程。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句: The company has a comprehensive onboarding process to help new employees adapt quickly to their roles."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"kick off"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“kick off”指的是开始某项活动或事件，通常用于描述比赛、会议或项目的启动。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The conference will kick off with a keynote speech by the CEO."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"get the ball rolling"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“get the ball rolling”意为开始某项活动或任务，通常用来指启动一个项目或开启一个讨论。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"Let's get the ball rolling on this project by setting up a meeting with the team.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"icebreaker"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"中文解释：冰破机；交流开场白。作为人们在会议、聚会或其他社交场合时用来消除紧张和尴尬的对话工具，小话题或活动。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：At the start of the meeting, the team leader used an icebreaker to warm up the participants."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"touch base"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“Touch base” 是一个源自英语的短语，在中文中通常被理解为「联系一下」或「沟通」。这个短语常用于商业或发展的对话中，用来表示与某人交流，以确认信息或获取进展更新。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"Let's touch base next week to discuss the project updates.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"orientation"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"在中文中，“orientation”通常指的是引导或指导的过程，帮助人们适应新的环境、角色或任务。例如，大学新生入学时会有“迎新会”，即“新生的 orientation”。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The company held an orientation session for the new employees to help them understand their roles and the workplace culture."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"coined the term"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“创造了这个术语”的意思是某个人首次使用某个词语或表达，并使其被广泛接受和使用。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The scientist coined the term "robotics" to describe the field of study related to robots."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"the perfect pitch (business term)"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“完美提案”在商业术语中指的是以最佳方式向潜在投资者、客户或合作伙伴展示业务计划、产品或服务的一种陈述。这种提案需要简洁、有说服力，并能有效抓住听众的兴趣，促使他们采取行动或达成协议。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The entrepreneur spent weeks refining his presentation to ensure it was the perfect pitch for the venture capitalists."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"kingpin"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"中文解释：在犯罪组织或非法活动中起核心角色或有重要影响力的人物，通常指头目或主谋。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The police finally captured the kingpin behind the drug trafficking operation."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"caffeinated"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“caffeinated” 是指含有咖啡因的，通常用来形容饮料，如咖啡、茶或能量饮料，以及由此带来的兴奋状态。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：After drinking two cups of caffeinated coffee, she felt more alert and focused."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"top-notch"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""顶级"或"最好的"。该短语用于描述某物质量极高或出类拔萃。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The hotel is known for its top-notch service and luxurious amenities."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"eye-catching"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“Eye-catching”用于描述某物非常吸引注意力、令人注目的。它通常用于形容色彩、设计或样式引人注目。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The eye-catching red dress made her stand out at the party."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"tie it all together"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""把一切都结合在一起"的意思是将不同的部分或元素整合在一起，使它们形成一个完整的整体。这个短语常用于强调逻辑、概念或实际项目的各个部分之间的连接或一致性。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"After gathering all the research data, the next step is to tie it all together in a comprehensive report.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Yankee"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“Yankee”在中文中通常指的是美国人，尤其是来自美国北部的居民。在历史上，这个词源于美国南北战争时期，是南方人用来称呼北方人的。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"My friend from New York city is a true Yankee, proud of his Northern heritage.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"ingenuity"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"中文解释：聪明才智、创新能力，是指人们在解决问题或创造新事物时表现出的独特、非凡的思维能力和创新精神。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Her ingenuity in designing the new software system impressed the entire team."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"stroke him chin"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语中的“stroke him chin”通常指的是轻轻地抚摸某人的下巴。这是一种温柔的动作，通常表示爱意、安慰或深思。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：She gently stroked his chin as they sat together on the porch."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"momentum"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“动量”是指物体的质量乘以速度，或者在日常用语中，指某事物持续增大或推动其前进的动力。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"The team gained momentum after winning three games in a row and is now leading the league.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"epiphany"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“顿悟”或“灵光一现”，意指在某一刻突然理解或领悟到某个重要的概念或问题。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：During the meeting, she had an epiphany about how to solve the ongoing problem."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"jumps in"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""Jumps in" 在中文中可以解释为突然加入或介入某个活动或对话，通常是指快速或不经考虑的动作。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：She always jumps in with her opinions during meetings, even when nobody asks for them."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"concur"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"中文解释：同意、赞同。指和某人有相同的意见或观点，或者对某件事达成一致。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：I concur with the committee's decision to implement the new policy."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"home run"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""本垒打"是棒球术语，指击球员在一杆打击中绕过所有垒，安全返回本垒得分。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：He hit a home run in the last inning, winning the game for his team."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"hit it out the park"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“hit it out the park”来源于棒球运动，字面意思是将球击出场外，表示取得了巨大成功或出色地完成了某项任务。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"Jane's presentation was so engaging and informative; she really hit it out of the park.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"miss a beat"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"在中文中，“miss a beat”常用来表示在人表现中没有出现丝毫的犹豫或错误，常常用于描述一个人的反应快速而且准确，没有间断。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Even when the unexpected power outage occurred, the experienced presenter didn’t miss a beat and continued the show seamlessly."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Crunch the numbers"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“Crunch the numbers”意指经过详细的计算来分析数据或得到结论，通常用于财务或者数据分析场景。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Before we make any investment, we need to crunch the numbers to assess potential risks and returns."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Elevator Pitch"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"电梯演讲是指在非常短的时间内（通常为30秒到2分钟内）简明扼要地推销自己的想法、产品或公司，就好像与某人在电梯里短暂停留的时间内进行交流。这种演讲方式要求内容简洁、有吸引力并直接切入重点，以便在最短的时间内引起听众的兴趣。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"During the networking event, Sarah delivered a compelling elevator pitch about her startup, impressing potential investors in under a minute.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Peel the Onion"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“Peel the Onion”意为深入探究或逐层揭开复杂问题的各个方面，就如剥洋葱一样逐层深入理解问题的核心。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"In order to understand the root cause of the team's operational issues, we need to peel the onion and examine every aspect of the process.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"foster"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""Foster" 在中文中通常指培养或促进某事物的发展，也可以指在非亲生环境中抚养孩子。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句："}},"
",{"type":"ul","key":"4","props":{"children":["
",{"type":"li","key":"1","props":{"children":"The teacher's main goal is to foster a love of learning in her students."}},"
"]}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"6","props":{"children":"（中文解释：这位老师的主要目标是培养学生对学习的热爱。）"}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"foster parents"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"养父母是指那些承担了抚养孩子责任的非亲生父母，通常通过社会服务机构安排，给予被抚养儿童安全、稳定的家庭环境。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英语例句：The foster parents provided a loving and supportive home for the children in their care."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"See the forest and not just the trees."}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这句话的意思是要从整体角度看问题，而不仅仅关注细节。它强调理解和把握整体背景或大局的重要性，而不是过于专注于单个或细微的部分。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：When planning a project, it's crucial to see the forest and not just the trees to ensure the overall success."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"brevity"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"简洁，即使用尽可能少的词语清晰表达思想。强调语言或表达方式的简明扼要。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"The professor appreciated the brevity of the student's report, which delivered the necessary information without unnecessary detail.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"analyses"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“分析”是对某一主题、现象或问题进行详细研究和解释的过程。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"English example: "The scientist conducted thorough analyses to understand the environmental impact of the new chemical.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"dissect"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""解剖"或"详细分析"。指把一个事物或问题进行详细拆解和研究。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The scientist decided to dissect the frog to study its internal organs more closely."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"greater than the sum of the parts"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“greater than the sum of the parts”中文解释为“整体大于部分之和”，通常用来形容一个系统、团队或协作的整体效果超出了各个独立部分简单相加所能达到的水平。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：The startup's success lies in its team dynamic, where the company is greater than the sum of the parts, leading to innovative solutions."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"make it back"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"中文解释：这个短语通常意思是回到原来的地方或状态，特别是从某个地方返回。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：After getting lost in the woods, we were relieved to finally make it back to the campsite."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"transfer it over to"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"将其转移到……"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":""Please transfer it over to the new account by tomorrow.""}},"
"]}}]}},{"type":"audio","key":null,"props":{"className":"py-3","src":"https://github.com/YuantianDing/yuantianding.github.io/raw/refs/heads/main/en/src/pages/notes/dailynote/2/_allnotes.mp3","controls":true}}]}}]}}
